Container padding

Quick snippet for setting container padding with CSS variables.

.container {
  --width: 56.25rem;
  --padding: 16px;
  max-width: calc(var(--width) + 2 * var(--padding));
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 var(--padding);
}
